title: Blitzcrank cannot use elecrtrocute
body: well as the title already says even if u hit 3 seperate spells with blitz and it wont prock electrocute

replies.body:
So, I tried it in Practicetool:
If you hook someone far enough it is not fast enough to trigger Electrocute, because the target needs to travel all the way to you.
I guess that's the only problem. But it still doesnt seem the "3 seconds" as said in the description of electrocute aren't really 3 seconds. More like 1.5 seconds.
